title: Our Boy Teddy Stars in the New Transition Sentinel Video!
content:
Transition took its all-new Sentinel to New Mexico for GiddyUp ambassador Teddy Jaramillo to rip around his local trails. This might be the most New Mexico shit weâ€™ve ever seen from the bike industry. Hell yeah, Ted!

The post Our Boy Teddy Stars in the New Transition Sentinel Video! appeared first on The Radavist.
author: John Watson
